definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
meticulous/(of domestic animals or fowls) young
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: Moreover, it seems that the head-to-toe denim look is so hot for the upcoming season.
sentences.chinese: 而且，从头到脚的牛仔布料是即将到来的大热门。

sentences.english: The roof, floor, and walls were insulated with recycled denim or non-toxic mineral wool insulation.
sentences.chinese: 房顶，地板，墙都用回收的牛仔布或无毒的矿棉隔离。

sentences.english: Mini-skirts are ruffled and flirty in denim or suede with laser-cut detailing.
sentences.chinese: 迷你短裙是娇媚的牛仔布或有精致激光雕刻绒面皮。

sentences.english: But before Japanese denim, there was Kaihara denim.
sentences.chinese: 但在日本牛仔布，牛仔布有海原。

sentences.english: But before Japanese denim, there was Kaihara denim.
sentences.chinese: 但在日本牛仔布，牛仔布有海原。

sentences.english: Following instructions on the fusing packet, iron it to the wrong side of this denim piece.
sentences.chinese: 按熨融胶包装上的说明将它熨在牛仔布的反面。

sentences.english: Denim market transactions are still not observed, but the prices are more stable.
sentences.chinese: 牛仔布市场成交仍未见放量，但价格走势却较为平稳。

sentences.english: Place the left denim sole piece on to a flat surface, right side down.
sentences.chinese: 将左脚牛仔布鞋底放平，正面向下。

sentences.english: You'll now have eight pieces of denim.
sentences.chinese: 现在共有八块牛仔布了。

sentences.english: Denim fabric bio-washed with acidic cellulase was further treated with laccase.
sentences.chinese: 靛蓝牛仔布用酸性纤维素酶洗后，进一步作漆酶处理。

sentences.english: A printed tee with faded stretch denim jean?
sentences.chinese: 一个褪色的弹力牛仔布？

sentences.english: Dark denim with a clean finish and subtle crosshatch texture.
sentences.chinese: 深色牛仔布用干净完成和微妙的交叉纹理。

sentences.english: New sky-blue indigo is sure to be a favorite for denim.
sentences.chinese: 新的天空蓝色靛蓝是肯定是牛仔布的一个喜爱。
